Welcome to GINAR’s documentation!¶

This documentation is the result of an ongoing collaborative effort by GINAR team. Although it has not been authorized by the foundation, we hope you will find it useful. We welcome new contributors. Note that sections of this guide may be outdated. Note that documentation in this guide that is still relevant could be moved to the Wiki.
